executeQuery

public <E> java.util.List<E> executeQuery(java.lang.String cacheRegion,
                                          QueryParameters.ResultType resultType,
                                          java.lang.String hql,
                                          java.lang.Object namedParameters,
                                          PageParameters pageParameters,
                                          Relationship... fetch)
Execute a query based on the parameters

Type Parameters:
E - The entity type
Parameters:
resultType - The desired result type
hql - The HQL query
namedParameters - The HQL named parameter values (normally a Map or a Bean)
pageParameters - The page parameters. Affects all ResultTypes, by limiting the number of results
fetch - The relationships to fetch, if any
Returns:
A List of the expected entity type. It will be:
  • A Page when ResultType == PAGE
  • A IteratorList when ResultType == ITERATOR
  • A List when ResultType == LIST
